selected_for_growth.decision_rationale: Promoting to PERMANENT. Feature is mature, stable, and essential for the pedagogical value proposition.
Evolving to BETA. Ready for integration into the main dashboard to provide immediate value to users.

hold_for_growth.reason: Requires significant DSP refactoring and cross-browser testing.
hold_for_growth.unblock_condition: When worker-safe YIN algorithm is verified.

executive_summary.estimated_impact: Simplified code and significantly improved visual analytics for users.
